description: A fruity chutney which goes well with cold or hot pork and serve with cheeses at the end of a meal.

default: 4 medium onions, peeled and finely chopped

steps: Bring the apples, onions, garlic, lemon juice, mustard seed and 590ml/1 pint of vinegar to the boil.
Add the raisins, ginger, salt, sugar and the rest of the vinegar.
Pour into clean, hot jam jars and cover as usual. Store for 6-8 weeks to allow the flavours to develop.
title: Apple and raisin chutney
